com.interpss.core.net

Interface Bus

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, ExtensionElement, NameTag, NetworkedElement, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AclfBus, AcscBus, BaseAclfBus<TGen,TLoad>, BaseAcscBus<TGen,TLoad>, BaseDStabBus<TGen,TLoad>, DcBus, DistBus, DStabBus, OpfBus, PVDcBus, SEBus, Static3PBus
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AclfBusImpl, AcscBusImpl, BaseAclfBusImpl, BaseAcscBusImpl, BaseDStabBusImpl, BusImpl, DcBusImpl, DistBusImpl, DStabBusImpl, OpfBusImpl, PVDcBusImpl, SEBusImpl, Static3PBusImpl

    public interface Bus
extends ExtensionElement
    A representation of the model object 'Bus'. Bus class for representing a Bus concept for power system simulation. A bus may contain multiple bus sections, which are stored in the busSecList.

    The following features are supported:

    • Base Voltage
    • Merge2 Bus Id
    • Sub Area Flag
    • Substation Id
    • Substation
    • Network
    • To Branch List
    • From Branch List
    See Also:
    NetPackage.getBus()

      • getFromBranchList

        org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<Branch> getFromBranchList()
        Returns the value of the 'From Branch List' reference list. The list contents are of type Branch. It is bidirectional and its opposite is 'From Bus'.

        If the meaning of the 'From Branch List' reference list isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        reference list to branches, which are connected to the bus at the fromside
        Returns:
        the value of the 'From Branch List' reference list.
        See Also:
        NetPackage.getBus_FromBranchList(), Branch.getFromBus()
